channel.title: Battle-X Alpha Stages
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://battle-x.net/images/bx.png[/img] [b]Server Not Released yet, must register in order to play! Register at Http://Battle-X.net to get ready for the release, suggest updates we should do before the release. Try out Alpha now![/b] [url=http://battle-x.net]Battle-X Website[/url] [url=http://battle-x.net/index.php?query=register]Register Account[/url] Expected Alpha Date. 11/20/2012-11/26/2012 (November 20th - November 26th) [b]Want to play Alpha right now? Register on the website to manage your accounts and login![/b] [b] Alpha Settings: ::setlevel, ::item, ie: ::setlevel 0 99, ::item 11694 1 All accounts will be deleted after Alpha! Earn a reward when the Official Server Launches by posting suggestions on the forums! [/b] [b]Features:[/b] Excellent Pking Perfect Switching New & Updated Minigames Always adding Unique Ideas New Gameframe Sounds/Music System Server/Website Integrated[Must register to play and manage your accounts] Economy/Pking Server - Items will have Value. Not to fast, but not to slow of an exp rate. Pk Point System Slayer Point System More Point Systems to come - Suggest some! Just come on our Forums and post suggestions! Website Functions:[Old Website Template] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=agDAfTUk1KY[/youtube] Website: [New Website Template - The Web Guy(Template only). Redid Template/All the site related Functions were done by me.] [img]http://battle-x.net/pix/14.png[/img] [img]http://battle-x.net/pix/15.png[/img] 1. Flawless Switching is now completed. No more Item Dragging/Long Delays Click for GIF Image http://battle-x.net/pix/clip0026.gif 2. Added in Auto Cast Button [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/10hvpef.png[/img] Updated Minigames: [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/hs6i38.jpg[/img]
Golden weapons This is a spin-off from the popular Call of Duty series; using a particular gun for a long period of time, getting a particular amt of kills will eventually lead to putting gold camouflage. Now before anyone writes this idea off.. The camouflage is just camouflage, it does not enhance the weapon in any way, shape or form; and once the camouflage is put on your weapon, it cannot be traded (Ex. You can color your abyssal whip golden at 10,000 NPC kills and over 200 hours of use). Points of emphasis: -The camouflage adds no bonus to the weapon -The weapon cannot be traded once colored -Time and kills need to be put in place [url=http://callofduty.wikia.com/wiki/Weapon_Camouflage]http://callofduty.wikia.com/wiki/Weapon_Camouflage[/url]
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/dgpdgh.png[/img] Untradeable/Undroppable - once golden its only yours. Unless you destroy it. [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/11bn79k.png[/img] Not all content showed on here considering it's Alpha, I still have a lot of work to put in this. At the moment I'm trying to get all the bugs and some more suggestions before an official release. Hope to see you join the Battle-X Community!

item.title: Battle-X Alpha Stages
item.dc:creator: @yesimanub yesimanub
item.description:
@yesimanub wrote:

you just gave me an idea

I love you call of duty idea of weapon camouflage

Read full topic

item.title: Battle-X Alpha Stages
item.dc:creator: @The_Djinn The Djinn
item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:

[center]

[b]Server Not Released yet, must register in order to play! Register at Http://Battle-X.net to get ready for the release, suggest updates we should do before the release. Try out

Alpha now![/b]

Battle-X Website
Register Account
Expected Alpha Date. 11/20/2012-11/26/2012 (November 20th - November 26th)

Want to play Alpha right now? Register on the website to manage your accounts and login!
[b]
Alpha Settings:
::setlevel, ::item, ie: ::setlevel 0 99, ::item 11694 1

All accounts will be deleted after Alpha!

Earn a reward when the Official Server Launches by posting suggestions on the forums!
[/b]

Features:
Excellent Pking
Perfect Switching
New & Updated Minigames
Always adding Unique Ideas
New Gameframe
Sounds/Music System
Server/Website Integrated[Must register to play and manage your accounts]
Economy/Pking Server - Items will have Value.
Not to fast, but not to slow of an exp rate.
Pk Point System
Slayer Point System
More Point Systems to come - Suggest some!
Just come on our Forums and post suggestions!

Website Functions:[Old Website Template]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=agDAfTUk1KY[/youtube]

Website: [New Website Template - The Web Guy(Template only). Redid Template/All the site related Functions were done by me.]

  1. Flawless Switching is now completed. No more Item Dragging/Long Delays

Click for GIF Image
http://battle-x.net/pix/clip0026.gif

  1. Added in Auto Cast Button

10hvpef.png764×484

Updated Minigames:

hs6i38.jpg761×499

Golden weapons This is a spin-off from the popular Call of Duty series; using a particular gun for a long period of time, getting a particular amt of kills will eventually lead to putting gold

camouflage. Now before anyone writes this idea off… The camouflage is just camouflage, it does not enhance the weapon in any way, shape or form; and once the camouflage is

put on your weapon, it cannot be traded (Ex. You can color your abyssal whip golden at 10,000 NPC kills and over 200 hours of use).
Points of emphasis:
-The camouflage adds no bonus to the weapon
-The weapon cannot be traded once colored
-Time and kills need to be put in place
http://callofduty.wikia.com/wiki/Weapon_Camouflage

Untradeable/Undroppable - once golden its only yours. Unless you destroy it.

Not all content showed on here considering it’s Alpha, I still have a lot of work to put in this. At the moment I’m trying to get all the bugs and some more suggestions before an official release.

Hope to see you join the Battle-X Community!

Read full topic
